## Checklist

- [ ] Branch follows GitFlow (`feature/*`, `release/*`, `hotfix/*`)
- [ ] Conventional commit(s) and PR title
- [ ] Updated docs/changelog if releasing or hotfixing
- [ ] Linked issue and added screenshots/logs if relevant
